#summary vfs.Open

= Function vfs.Open =

|| *Syntax* || vfs.Open(string file, string mode) || 
|| *Description* || Opens file in the directory vfs, when mode is 'wb' it will be created. ||
|| *Returns* || handle or nil on failure. ||

<br>
*Example*
{{{
local fh = vfs.Open("somefile.bin", "wb")

if( fh ~= nil ) then
	local wrote = vfs.Write(fh, VFS_WRITE_STRING, "Hello World")
	print("Wrote " .. wrote .. " bytes")
	vfs.Close(fh)
end
}}}
